# BrainGlobe tools

## BrainGlobe Atlas API
Initial observation - lots of similar communities working independently

- Model species
- Imaging modality
- Anatomical focus
- Developmental stage


::: footer
[Claudi, F. et al. (2020) “BrainGlobe Atlas API: a common interface for neuroanatomical atlases” JOSS, v5(54), 2668](https://doi.org/10.21105/joss.02668)
:::

::: {.notes}
- Expand API acronym
:::


## BrainGlobe Atlas API
- Underlies all BrainGlobe tools
- Standardised access to multiple atlases (mouse, rat, zebrafish etc)
- Allows tools to be atlas/species agnostic

Right, visualization of the cerebellum and tectum in the larval zebrafish brain (data from Kunst et al., 2019) 
:::

# Accessibility and expansion
## Packaging and documentation
- All tools on PyPI and/or CondaForge
- All packages are maintained and updated to keep up with the broader SciPy ecosystem
- Documentation, tutorials, and example data available

## More atlases
- New atlases being packaged
- Show number of issues for new atlases (highlight the interest and breadth)
- Good community contributions
